name: Die Backpfeife aus dem Nichts
description:
Your friend has no idea that he is posessed by the devil. Slap it out of him by clicking on him. Don't kill him.

Which means: As the devil gets more visible you will get a higher score for slapping your friend and he loses less health.

A game made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 29. Ludum Dare Page
